amendment.description: Amendment reduces the account for Departmental Administration by $2,390,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the account for Departmental Administration by $2,390,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (IN) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (IN) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Young (IN).
